alert.note: Alert for Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:31PM CDT until July 18 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Pemiscot County in southeastern Missouri... West central Crockett County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Dyer County in west Tennessee... Lauderdale County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Haywood County in west Tennessee... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blytheville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Ripley, Gosnell, Steele, Halls, Cooter, Dell, Burdette, Nutbush, Forked Deer, Chestnut Bluff, Heloise, Ashport, Henning, Maury City, Gates, Holland, Edith, Dearman and O`Donnell Bend. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
